overview: Two lovers try to die together in order to live forever. When they die at the same time, neither of them will experience the loss of the other. This is the only moment, in the course of their lives, when neither will experience the inevitable loss of the other, either through natural death or separation. Will they make it or will something inevitably go wrong?

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: The path to love is difficult. Follow the thread.
title: Lovehaters
